title: Bug 18915[Preferences] switching between erroneous preference pages should generate error, not warning.
EB: When entering invalid data on any preference page and receiving a UI red flag, attempting to select another page without fixing the issue generates a warning dialog stating 'The currently displayed page contains invalid values'. This warning dialog should be an error dialog, as it is not allowed to leave the page without resolving the mistake.
SR: The warning dialog should be replaced with an error dialog when trying to switch between erroneous preference pages.
